error.below-in-amount: The value must be smaller than the minimum Shuttle-In amount
error.below-out-amount: The value must be smaller than the minimum Shuttle-Out amount
error.above-in-fee: The value must be greater than or equal to the Shuttle-In fee
error.above-out-fee: The value must be greater than or equal to the Shuttle-Out fee
error.above-current: The value must be greater than the minimum collateral amount

for-not-update: Indicates not to update the Shuttle-In amount
mortgage-popup: Update the collaterals amount to the value you entered. The current collaterals balance will be refunded
popup-cool: In order to avoid frequent fluctuations in the rules, there will be a {{cooldownMinutes}}-minute freeze time after the rules are modified, and they can be modified again after thawing
locked: The rules are frozen and cannot be modified temporarily
be-captain-txt: 您要竞选该服务商，需要给出更优的价格
